Lack of existence: The expert points out that there is no actual city named "Effing" in South Carolina, which raises doubts about the authenticity of the claim.
Digital alteration: The expert states that the text seen on the church sign was digitally altered, indicating that the photograph may have been manipulated.
Inconsistent information: The expert highlights inconsistencies in the information provided by the Facebook page claiming to be the Crystal Methodist Church of Effing SC, suggesting that their claims may not be reliable.
Repetition and lack of movement: The expert notices that the Facebook page has created multiple versions of the same church sign, all with identical lighting conditions. Additionally, certain elements in the background of the images remain unchanged over a significant period, raising suspicions about the credibility of the claim.
